找到问题了，是自己粗心造成的，因为对方和我说没有版本的，我看了一下，是有版本，加上版本号没问题！

可以自己实现一个 类， 专门 去扫 某个 package 下面的classes
然后 
ServiceBean serviceBean = new ServiceBean()
serviceBean.set...
serviceBean.set...
serviceBean.export()

### What is the purpose of the change
Here a new problem is found.
When using GenericService，and add a MethodConfig with loadbalance config，the loadbalance on method will be no effect. 

### Brief changelog
1. Use the tool method getRealMethodName() and getArgument() in RpcUtils instead of the code writen by myself.
2. Fix the problem that the methodName used in the AbstractClusterInvoker is not correct. Using RpcUtils.getRealMethodName(invocation) instead of invocation.getMethodName()
3. Change the test case of loadbalance consumer to adapt the new case，and cover the new logic

Hello， this problem I have figure out in #1123 ， and try to pull request to fix it #1144 。
Please stay focused~ 
And if there are any suggestions, please send them to me. Thank you~

Maven wrapper is a plugin more suitable for business project, we don't need this feature for dubbo as it is a framework.

Dear sir,
One of my colleague did some tests according your suggestion, but it seems not work:
 environment:
JDK update to 1.7, and dubbo update to 2.5.8
![1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17892859/34554510-2feb88f0-f168-11e7-95bf-4ecf1412eeb5.png)

Following the manual of telnet part: http://dubbo.io/books/dubbo-user-book/references/qos.html ,
we modified the file dubbo.properties in dubbo-admin, set the dubbo.qos.port=**33333**  .
but in the log file, we found the port still is 22222(default).  set the dubbo.qos.accept.foreign.ip=**true**,
I also can telnet to dubbo port 2088X.

My current properties:
![2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17892859/34554813-c14bc3f4-f169-11e7-83de-628b85a7595f.png)

We just want disable the access of telnet 2088x, and we do'nt know where is the key point.  would you please give us some particular advice for this issue?

regards,
Lloyd.
This PR contains many irrelevant file changes. Would you please submit a new PR?

and further step:
add a switch in dubbo.properties:
![3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/17892859/34556118-0b9bcdea-f170-11e7-9749-214f811dc408.png)
and restart the dubbo, it's also telnet 2088x success...

@brainhunt If you don't want retry, i recommend use `failfast` policy instead.
Besides, i think `retries=-1` means don't retry is also acceptable, since failover means retry, we can not figure out `retries=0` is a default value or user explicitly set 0.

I don't think we should change the `DEFAULT_RETRIES ` value.
I give my reason here  #1085

How come there is a compilation problem.
You get this problem when you try to compile the dubbo source or when you are using dubbo in you own projects? 
What is your jetty version?

@chickenlj Yes, you are right. When use the `failover` policy, retries must be more than one.
Thanks a lot.

That's a hessian serialization problem, and i think your solution can works fine.
But can you add a  unit test for this change?
我看过这个issue，情况貌似还不一样，我先看看你的issue及pr

文档中有；是在20880上递增；
要是设置了值，能在设置值的基础上递增就更好啦！
We check `enabled` immediately after  receiving notification, we check `runtime` here only to  decide whether we should run the router rule every time.
嗯，pr里包含了一个fix，是关于由于每次调用根据invoker构建hash环使用的identityHashCode都不同，导致每次调用hash环都会被重建的问题
I think there will be a compatibility problem when projects using different dubbo version calling each other.
try to compile the dubbo source .

Thanks for your effort, but we are planning to no longer support this feature since fewer people use this feature. Are you using this feature now?

The ClA license check may be passed the next time you pull a new request
同求

Dubbo will re-throw the original business exception thrown on provider side. But if consumer encountered some problem when calling remote peer, such as timeout or no provider, it will throw RpcException.
use `port=-1`

I think it is your responsibility taking care of ThreadPoolTaskExecutor. For example, you can add a hook and waiting for ThreadPoolTaskExecutor to finish. 
Currently, dubbo has no extension point for you to add listener or hook which will be notified when dubbo is shutting down.

thank you , but I find one method , when I want shutdown dubbo , I must stop the ThreadPoolTaskExecutor work (stop insert into the queue) through web  admin (system config)  , so work will all run on dubbo ThreadPool , then gracefully shutdown can ensure business not lost ,

You use the api `ReferenceConfig` to config dubbo? Highly recommend cache your ReferenceConfig instance.
I do not understand your question.

I am sorry about that, we are planning to refactor this part, but we still don't have time at this moment. 
Here's one open source implementations for your reference: [dubbo-monitor](https://gitee.com/handu/dubbo-monitor)

We have refactored the annotation part and marked the `AnnotationBean` as deprecated in 2.5.7.
You can refer [the documentation](https://github.com/alibaba/dubbo/issues/1171) or [sample](https://github.com/alibaba/dubbo/tree/master/dubbo-test/dubbo-test-examples/src/main/java/com/alibaba/dubbo/examples/annotation) for more details.
More detailed introduction to Annotation and Spring-Boot-Starter is still in progress by @mercyblitz .
You catch that error on your browser when using `system.management/logs` function of dubbo-admin?
That is a functional defect, but i am afraid it won't get fixed in the next few releases.
@mercyblitz need your help here.
@guo168  Why do we have to customize the order of DubboConfigConfigurationSelector?
Fixed with PR  #1170
因为这个扫描级别最高，且不可更改，失去了程序集成或者拓展的灵活性，比如我们这边用了百度的disconf 统一配置，也是居于spring集成的，它的扫描级别也要最高，因为配置文件下载且注入到容器里相关位置肯定是要最早，这种情形就出现问题了。比如我dubbo相关properties配置也是通过disconf管理，这是就出现了dubbo先执行，但是找不到配置文件。
而且就算没出现问题，单单从框架设计考虑，默认最高且可配置，不是更好吗，why not？框架设计默认了一些常规性需要，也需要提供灵活性以支持更多复杂的集成环境，和未知的需要，毕竟这个改动成本极低。本身就是通过@EnableDubbo @EnableDubboConfig注解为入口 只要在这个入口提供属性就可以

`AnnotationBean`is an internal-use class that had some issues on implementation, more details please refer here :
https://github.com/mercyblitz/blogs/blob/master/java/dubbo/Dubbo-Annotation-Driven.md

server端的业务处理线程数 @zhaojigang 
Dubbo2.5.3以及Dubbo2.5.8均是这种现象，没关注netty版本。
压测时查看线程对战，发现日志打印会有部分影响(log4j1以及logback)，修改成log4j2，之后，性能有所提升，但是work线程数占比仍然不高。
如下为各种状态线程占比。
Status | Number of Threads : 237 | Percentage
-- | -- | --
Deadlock | 0 | 0 (%)
Runnable | 29 | 12 (%)
Waiting on condition | 200 | 84 (%)
Waiting on monitor | 4 | 2 (%)
Suspended | 0 | 0 (%)
Object.wait() | 3 | 1 (%)
Blocked | 1 | 0 (%)
Parked | 0 | 0 (%)

如下为某一waiting线程栈，处于等待任务的状态：
ubboServerHandler-10.10.56.20:7778-thread-111" daemon prio=10 tid=0x00007f20584d6800 nid=0x5cb waiting on condition [0x00007f2052cab000]

@mercyblitz 感谢您的回答，我知道您说的这些，您说的是对的，不过我想说的是，因为DubboConfigBindingRegistrar在处理的各个dubbo基础bean（比如ApplicationConfig.class） 的BeanDefinition注册的阶段,就已经需要通过environment加载properties，且这时候还在如果我是用properteis文件配置方式，那么这个时候必须保证我本地有这些properties配置文件，问题是假设系统集成的统一配置管理平台，比如我这边集成了百度的disconf(也是基于spring 处理)，那么他需要去配置文件中心下载properties文件再加载到environment，但该下载动作处理的时刻比前面讲的那个dubbo 基础bean BeanDefinition 注册阶段还晚，显然是有问题。当然我这边是有办法解决，但该问题应该会有很多人碰到。

>excuse me，there is another little problem. When there is only one provider ,i can not offline it from admin,
and i traced the code ,i got this (RegistryDirectory.java line 253 from the latest version)

That is an protection mechanism of dubbo to prevent unexpected `No Providers` from happening. Why do you have to offline the only provider, won't it cause `No Providers` exception on consumer side?

>I know dubbo has replace the exception message 'black list...' with 'no provider ...' since some version

Maybe we can reorganize the exception information so that it reflects both`blacklist` and `no provider`.
